column4: if I have a CD full of ttf fonts, and want to install them to use in X and GIMP, things like that, do I move them to the /var/lib/defoma/x-ttcidfont-conf.d/dirs/TrueType dir like it says in my xconfig?
you can just do "nautilus fonts:///" and drag n drop
personally... i use totem for video and rhythmbox for audio
